property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your hand and your opponent would look at your hand for his effect, you may put this card into your Ring. When this card enters your Ring, choose 1 non-Superstar-specific card in his Ring. This card gains the text of the chosen card, and that card is blank while this card is in your Ring. During your turn, you may put this card from your Ring into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your maneuvers are +2 Stun Value and reversals to them are D: 0 for the rest of the turn. Ringside Search 1- cards, and shuffle 7- Ringside cards into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played as a Counter or after a 'Classic' maneuver. When played as a Counter, overturn 4 cards. When played after a 'Classic' maneuver, cannot be reversed from hand. When this card is in your Ringside and you move a card with Classic Competitor, you may put this card into your Backlash.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: # = your total Ring 'Driver' cards (Min. 2, Max. 4). This card requires # reversals. When # is 3+, this card is a Trademark Finisher instead of a Grapple. Opponent discards #, and this card is +# Stun Value.

card.name: Hall of Fame Hall of Famer

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Harley Race, The Nature Boy, Dusty Rhodes, Terry Funk

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, shuffle this and 2- Ringside cards into your Arsenal and draw 1-. As a reversal, Ringside Search 1- cards. When this card is in your Ring or Ringside and your opponent successfully plays a maneuver, you may Bury this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have equal or greater Fortitude, reverse any Unique card. When you have lower Fortitude or when your opponent is a female Superstar, reverse any card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successful maneuver. When played after From The Top Rope, cannot be reversed from your opponent's hand. During your turn when this card is in your hand, you may discard it and Arsenal Search 1- High Risk.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, your opponent cannot play more than 1 reversal to this card. When this card is overturned, you may put it in your Ring; when it reverses from Arsenal, put 1- Ringside Pre-Match cards into your Ring. When you would draw for your Draw Segment, you may instead Bury that many Ringside cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your maneuver is successful and you have 10+ Fortitude, you may put this card from your hand into your Ring; when it is a 'Chair', 'Leg', 'Ankle', or 'Head' maneuver, your opponent discards his hand. As an action, cannot be reversed by hybrid cards. As a reversal, -10F, when overturned reverse any non-Damage card effect (even during the Pre-match phase) and put this card into your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, -10F and when played as a Counter, cannot be reversed from hand. As a reversal, reverse any High Risk or card played after a Set-up card.

card.name: Edge and Christian's Backstage Card of Awesomeness

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card, you may pack Edge's Spear, Edge Kick, Downward Spiral, Edge-O-Matic, and Unprettier. Each turn, you may skip your Draw Segment; if you do, your opponent discards 1 card (when you have fewer hand cards, he discards randomly). When your Mid-match maneuver or Superstar-specific card is unsuccessful, he discards 1 random card; when it is successful, your next card played this turn can be a non-Unique Ringside maneuver as if from hand, and it is Chain.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Throwback Superstar. As an action, Bury any number of Hand cards and draw that many +3. As a reversal, reverse any 10D- maneuver. When this card is in your Ring and your maneuver is successful, your opponent discards 1 card or RFG 2 Ringside cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: *Can only be revealed when a turn ends and you have 20- Arsenal cards. Cannot be packed when packing Wrestlemania. Shuffle 10- Ringside cards and 3- non-'Divine' RFG cards into your Arsenal, draw 3- cards, Ringside Search any number of 'Ankle Lock' cards and your opponent discards 1 random card. His cards are -2D and -1SV.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card, you may pack 1 copy of Mid-match cards with an ACE in your Backstage, but you cannot pack copies of those cards in your Backlash. Put any Backstage Mid-match cards into your Backlash. Before you overturn for your Ability, Bury or Stack 2- Ringside cards; this cannot be prevented.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: The Largest Athlete in Sports Entertainment

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card you are a WCW Superstar, and you may pack 'Giant' maneuvers regardless of Superstar Logo (they are now WCW instead), but you may not pack Crank it Up. Your Showstopper Chokeslam is +20F, +10D, and replace 'Strike' with 'Unique' in its text. You are considered to have lower Fortitude for your Where The Big Boys Play; when you have more total Damage in your Ring than your opponent, only choose 1 card for its effect.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: The Largest Athlete in Sports Entertainment

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you play A Giant Shift in Power, hide this card. When your Fortitude Rating is greater than the printed Fortitude of your played non-Multi Strike, Grapple, or Submission without a reversal restriction from your effect, it is +#D (#= the maneuver's printed Fortitude), and its damage cannot be modified by your other effects. When your opponent moves a card from your Ring with your Ability, before you end your turn you may play a Superstar-specific action from hand or Backlash, and it can only be reversed by non-hybrid cards. After your Draw Segment, you may reveal your hand. If you have no maneuvers, put a random Ringside maneuver into your hand.

card.name: Nothing's Out of Reach For the Million Dollar Man

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: The Million Dollar Man, Irwin R. Schyster, Money Inc, Sid, Bam Bam Bigelow, Nikolai Volkoff

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are not 'The Million Dollar Man' Ted DiBiase or Money Inc, can only be revealed when The Million Dollar Corporation is played. Your opponent cannot play Your Reach Exceeds Your Grasp to your non-Volley maneuvers. When you have 5+ Fortitude and a D: 1+ maneuver in your Ring, hide this card and Bury 2- RFG cards (when you are 'The Million Dollar Man' Ted DiBiase, 3- cards).

card.name: Are You Ready for a Revolution?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. When packing this card, you may also pack 'Technical' maneuvers, your 'Suplex' maneuvers are considered to have 'Technical' in the title, and your printed “Technical” cards are Foreign Objects for your effects, but you cannot pack First Blood Match. Your Walking Out of WCW is F:0 and your opponent cannot respond to it. Replace 'unless you are Dean Malenko' with 'or as a Counter' on your Technical Superiority.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have greater Fortitude, this card is a Trademark Finisher instead and ignore 'completely' in your opponent's reversals to it. When successful, you may discard 5- Hand cards and he overturns the same number. When this effect is reversed, he overturns the same number again.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: ACE: During your turn, when you have greater Fortitude, you may overturn 2 cards, and then shuffle this card into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successful and you have fewer Hand cards than your opponent, choose 1: Draw cards until you have greater Hand cards, or he discards until he has fewer Hand cards. When successful and you have equal or greater Hand cards, shuffle Ringside cards into your Arsenal equal to the number of cards in your hand.
